website_summaries.verdict: Self-adhesive nipple concealers that look and feel natural.
pros: Made from medical-grade, hypo-allergenic silicone, so they work well for even the most sensitive skin
Lightweight and small enough to fit in a handbag
Self-adhesive and reusable if washed with warm water and mild soap after each use
Manufacturer claims each pair can be reused 25 times or more
Available in round or flower shape
cons: Some users complained that they were too thin and showed through clothing or didn't stay in place around the edges

customer_reviews.title: Product works as intended - Best so far
customer_reviews.text: Update: Still going great! I have used the same set several times and they had not lost their stickiness. I gave a pair to a neighbor to try. So far these are the best I have found. The item arrived quick and was as advertised. For the money I think they are pretty good. Being reusable is a plus. I like that they are silicone vs the pasty ones and they provide adequate nipple coverage. Personally I would not say these are to be worn alone under sheer clothing but more for a smoothing effect under a bralette or a solid colored dress or top of medium weight.
customer_reviews.author: Wild Orchid XXX

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This product is incredible! Absolutely love them. I was trying on lots of clothes and they stayed on. They also managed to stay on with sweating throughout the day. You cannot see the circle through clothes unless the shirt is extremely thin. They are comfortable enough that I forgot they were there. I'm not sure if they'd fit on someone with very small breasts though? I am a C.cup and they were great.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Kept a stock supply of these
customer_reviews.text: Towards the end of my pregnancy, I could no longer fit into any of my bras or bralettes due to my ever growing breasts. I didn't like the shape and look of the maternity nursing bras. They were very matronly and not the most aesthetically pleasing with clothes either. So honestly, towards the end of my pregnancy, I just wore these pasties. My breasts felt free and I wasn't grossly offending my coworkers with my nipples.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: The package came with two shapes of nipple covers, I wear them on my vacation in a very humid weather from morning to night, they are soft and comfy, the color looks neutral, so you can wear whatever color shirt or dress on top. Compared to the old one I had this brand is more breathable and stick on to your skin after many times washing. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Keke

customer_reviews.title: Great pasties! Cyborg boobs!
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for a dress-up party I went to at a club. If I hadn't worn these, you would've seen my nips right through my costume...and it was COLD out, too! These stayed in place all night. I was dancing for hours and not a slip. They also make your boobs look like cyborg boobs cuz it all just ends up blending in (if your skin is the same color - mine is). My boyfriend was weirded out and got a good laugh. Nice and sticky. Save the plastic piece to put it back on, so you can use them again. I didn't have any sticky residue left behind, either.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Throw away your bras
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest invention of all time. I know they have been around for awhile, but I had never tried them, and in the meantime have amassed a crazy collection of bras. The 100 degree heat prompted me to look for an alternative, and oh my! Unless it's a very tight, or very sheer shirt, these are the ticket. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Carol J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended product!
customer_reviews.text: They do the job well without giving my sensitive skin problems. These pasties can be washed, air-dried and re-used. I've washed my first pair 3 times and they're still sticking. After each air drying, I stick them onto cling wrap (the same type you would use to wrap food) until next use. Highly recommended product!
customer_reviews.author: Sovanny

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I used this product before, first time buying it from this seller. product itself serves its purpose. easy to use, easy to clean. you can easily get more than 20 uses for a pair if you know how to take care of it.
customer_reviews.author: Ferita

customer_reviews.title: Sticks great so far
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, stick very well and are extremely soft. Can't even tell I am not wearing a bra. I have only wore them two days in a row so hopefully they continue to stick great Day 5- have washed them twice now out of the five days and they are still sticky. so far i am really impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amber W

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly while I was standing up in a wedding in Florida. It was SO humid, but I was never afraid these pastors were coming off. They stuck on amazingly.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: I could only find single packs of these reusable little outfit savers for around the same price at stores. These are a steal for the same price I have 4 pairs! They stay on all day even in the warm summer days. Now I can finally wear backless summer dresses and tops without worry.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Too thick. Making them visible
customer_reviews.text: After reading previous reviews, I new I was taking a chance purchasing these pasties. But, have had past experiences where I haven't shared the same issues/complaints with products as some reviewers have. These were sadly not wearable, for my intended dress/occasion. And I have yet to find anything that they can be worn with. The shape of these are very visible through everything you'd need to wear them for
customer_reviews.author: Kaytee Infinity

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good with this purchase. They came in a nice package and I have used a set of the circles three times so far, following the wash and store instructions- they're holding up well. Much better than pairs I have purchased in stores too! With four pairs I feel I will be able to definitely get my "moneys worth" as far as usage and am overall happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: THE BEAUTY BO$$

customer_reviews.title: The edges are terrible, and these covers show through lightweight shirts
customer_reviews.text: The tapered edges that are supposed to provide a smooth look constantly fold under to stick to themselves. If they aren't folding under, then they are lifting up and catching lint off of my shirts. One pair is black on the edges after I wore them under a black t-shirt. When I tried to wear them under lightweight shirts of various colors, the circle outline was clear as could be. In lighter colors, the middle, where the nipples are, were darker than if I wasn't wearing these things. Ultimately, you get what you pay for, and I didn't pay a whole lot. Next time, I'm going to a local retailer.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Fixemer

customer_reviews.title: They work great
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never purchased pasties before, so I wasn’t sure how they would work. They work great when you don’t want to wear a bra but don’t want to say hello to the world with your nipplage. Easy to apply and reusable. Kind of band-aid like when removing but fine if you go slow.
customer_reviews.author: Sleepy In Paris

customer_reviews.title: You can see the whole nipple cover itself, looks like giant areolas through your top..
customer_reviews.text: The only negative I can say is that it looks like giant areolas when I wear them without a bra. No matter the matter of shirt/tank top material I’m wearing you can see the whole nipple cover... pretty much defeats the whole purpose of getting them to use without a bra.. Only positive is they are comfortable, easy to remove/stick on, other than that, not buying them again. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my shoulders say Thank You!
customer_reviews.text: Summer time, wear this and liberate your shoulders! I am wearing them everyday now! I am between cup B-C, I didn't think I could go to Gym wearing them but they work great! Only down side is they do not work with my white tops well, they look weired shape under my (not thin)white tops.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, stayed on well
customer_reviews.text: Revised review - after my negative review, I was contacted by the seller and offered a new package to retry. I have to admit that I was very doubtful that there would be any difference. To my surprise, the new pastors that I received worked very well. They stayed on all day. I washed them with soap and water and have them on today and they have stayed put. The seller was very good to work with and handled my complaint very well. I would recommend this product and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Utter

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So I'm usually really skeptical about using anything but a bra, but these are wonderful! The silicone it's made out of is thick and super soft. There is a large area for the nipple so it doesn't get stuck to the actual cover. The covers are formed to make it completely smooth and flush with your skin so you don't see divots or lines through whatever you're wearing. Removing them is amazing as well, the adhesive is strong enough to stay in place all day but it doesn't pull your skin when you remove them. A great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: A.Natalee

customer_reviews.title: Wish they were a little bit bigger because they kind ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish they were a little bit bigger because they kind of stick out under shirts (not clingy shirts at that). Still do the job and take the ease of not wearing a bra all the time.
customer_reviews.author: ekb

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Adhesion Restores with Gentle Washing
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly. I have a tendency toward skin sensitivity for glues that stick to skin, like with bandaids, etc. These give me No Issues Whatsoever x 2 days, and about 6-7 hours interval per day worn. They were easily washed with plain liquid soap and warm water, and the stickiness was completely restored once air dried. They are Comfortable. I will keep these on my Amazon shopping list.
customer_reviews.author: Southwestern Latina

customer_reviews.title: Great nipple covers
customer_reviews.text: These are very useful. I do not like to wear padded bras during the summer but I hate the peep show my nipples give. These stop that. They have also been great for my bralettes and thinner tshirts. No show at all. I thought the outline may be visible but I have had no issues at all. They are reuseable. Just wash and dry and stick them back on. They are cool at first but you can warm them between your hands for a second before putting them on. These are great for backless/braless outfits but still keeping some dignity.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: These are so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to use under some of my bras that were a little thinner then I needed them to be. These apply easily, are comfortable to wear, and help for no nipple show through. I have forgotten I was wearing them. The sticky part has been just right and I haven't had any issues with the covers coming off in my bra. Washing them is a little hard because they then stick to the counter when drying as instructed. I would love a case or something to store them. One tip is to save the thin plastic film on the covers. I stick those back on them when dry.
customer_reviews.author: ericlovesarah

customer_reviews.title: Great value for what I got!!
customer_reviews.text: I used to own a pair of nip pad as I didn’t think I would wear them often enough to justify more. However, after two uses, the sticky parts start to get a hold of hair and debris which looks disgusting. I found these ones at very affordable price and I think it’s very important to have multiple nip pads at home in case I need to wear something that doesn’t go well with a bra. 4 pairs should be enough for any of my future use.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Effective and stay in place
customer_reviews.text: I got these to be in a wedding - my bridesmaid dress was silk and spaghetti straps, so any bra would have shown. These are a good size to cover my admittedly smaller nips (not huge, not tiny), and didn't end up huge on my A cup boobs. They also stayed on all day and were so comfortable I forgot I was wearing them, even during sweaty dancing. Very happy with these, will happily wear again.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I was really nervous about buying these because I’ve tried so many bras that would allow me to wear backless dresses or off the shoulder sleeves and none ever worked! I have a bigger bust (38D) and resolved that those cute outfits just weren’t for me... until I bought these nipple covers. They don’t work for every outfit - but they have certainly given me way more freedom than I had before. Obviously you don’t get the support - but if you’re not quite ready to go braless this is a happy medium!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Maxon

customer_reviews.title: Edge flips up a little, otherwise good product.
customer_reviews.text: I wear breast petals almost every day, because I can't stand to wear a bra. These are pretty good for the price. Pros: I can wear these for about a month before the stickum starts to go. I also like the non-adhesive nip proctor patch in the center. Cons: The edges are very thin and non adhesive, so they sometimes flip up and could create a line under tight clingy shirts. I tend to wear loose clothing so it's not much of an issue. Note that packaging is not as pictured. Packaging is a pink zip envelope with mostly Japanese text, and the amusing title "Very Fashion Sexy Health." I have included a picture.
customer_reviews.author: Hibbie

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Completely Hide Anything
customer_reviews.text: Definitely lessened the appearance of my nipples, but definitely did not work as well as depicted. You can't wear anything even moderately fitted. I have a few pieces that follow my shape but aren't tight, and you could still tell I wasn't wearing a bra. Not infrequently, you could sort of see the whole outline of the cover and it would look like I had giant, albeit soft nipples. Smh. I am sending them back for a refund. (this was from trying two butterfly pairs on about 4-5 occasions)
customer_reviews.author: ooo-uuu

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and invisible
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with these covers. They are skin colored so they dont show through clothes that are really thin. Plus there is soft material where your nipple is so the sticky part is not attached to your nipple. Plus it gives you extra thickness to hide your nipples from showing through. It does not hurt to take off and no irritation. You can wear them all day long and forget that you are even wearing them. When you take them off, you just wash it with warm water, air dry and they are ready to wear again.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne Graham

customer_reviews.title: Not the ones for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad that these worked for some people, but for me it did not have a smooth appearance under clothing. I ended up buying another brand that has less curvature and also came in various colors to help blend with your skin. Additionally I noticed that the adhesive started peeling off after wearing them about 10 to 15 times therefore not lasting nearly as long as advertised
customer_reviews.author: BodieMo

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: These nipple covers are a good deal for the price. However, the big name brand I first bought hard plastic protectors to store the covers on, which protected them nicely. The Amazon covers merely have a thin piece of Saran Wrap type of material in between each cover. I have to keep using these when I take the covers off at the end of the day, for protection and storage. This is getting more difficult, over time, to do since the covers can be used multiple times before discarding.
customer_reviews.author: barbara silverstein

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, stick well, get the job done
customer_reviews.text: They stick very well even on hot weather. When wearing them I don’t feel them! However, if you do wear very tight clothing on top the covers may show. The color is perfect for me (they are not pink). The diameter could be bigger since it barely covers the whole aureola, but it’s not a dealbreaker for me, especially at this price. I used them once, and cleaned them with baby shampoo and water and let them dry overnight and they’re like new. I wish they came with a better way to store them though.
customer_reviews.author: Victor M Zuniga

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Stay On
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because they 1/2 the cost of another pair that I’ve gotten before. Sadly, these are garbage. They don’t stay on at all—not even on 1st use. I had one fall off while I was talking to someone and had to catch it before it fell out of my shirt. So embarrassing. 😳😱🤬
customer_reviews.author: Kristin M

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I really wasn't impressed with this product it didn't really conceal my nipple the way it should you could still see it through my shirt. I'm sort of like the rubber of the product isn't really dense enough to conceal the nipple. Not to mention that you I could actually see not only the bump of my nipple through my clothes but you could also see the nipple cover which I don't mean transparent but the outline and the shape. This just wasn't for me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: No Stickum
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me. The first pair I put on stayed on all day and,since you can’t tell you have them on, I forgot and slept in them and they were still on the next morning. But after that it was all down hill. That pair would not stick again so I tried the other pairs. They wouldn’t even stay stuck the first use. I kept finding them here and there all over the house. Fortunately no one came in (self quarantined) or it could have been embarrassing.
customer_reviews.author: Prof

customer_reviews.title: This brand doesn't stick for some reason
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to buy these online instead of buying some from Walmart or Target where I usually get mine, but these were disappointing. I've tried just wearing them around the house a couple times first, and they won't stay put. Oh well. I would recommend another brand personally.
customer_reviews.author: hayley

customer_reviews.title: Opens up your closet to wear all in comfort and without feeling constricted
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Has really opened up my closet and comfort. Came back to add comment.. It’s been at least a year or more since purchasing these.. ( this brand is my fav) I can’t imagine being without them. In my situation ..Fibromyalgia is the main reason I don’t / can’t wear a bra. Spasms also. I also suffer from hot flashes so a tight garment of any kind is miserable . These little gems allow me to be comfortable in the Florida heat without added pain.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Hendriks

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I got three round ones and two floral shaped ones.. did not came in as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: weston mccall

customer_reviews.title: Super product, bra issues relieved for good!
customer_reviews.text: These are a must have for women with breast augmentation or young women wearing strapless or backless tops who aren't sagging. Heck for women even if you do sag lol! Bras get old, even great ones, so these are a genius way to go braless without it being obvious. They dont even show they're on in the thinnest fabrics. Thats fantastic! The better you store them, the longer the adhesive lasts. I forget theyre on!! Love love love em!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly J. Horban

customer_reviews.title: Let them free!!!
customer_reviews.text: Goodbye bra! I’ve only worn these for a week, but they continue to “stick” after washing daily. Only downside is I wear a black polo to work, so it looks dirty around the edges after day one. And if I’m wearing a clingy shirt, you can see the outline of the circle. Regardless, I’ll continue to wear these because I refuse to wear a bra!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Functional but obvious.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Very comfortable, I can't feel them while wearing them. -Strong adhesive, they stay on even in sweaty summer heat. Cons: -No matter what shirt or dress I tried on I could see the outline of these nipple covers. You can tell I'm wearing them. Kinda defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Like you're not wearing anything at all!
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably comfortable! Once I applied them, I didn't even notice they were there, which is saying a lot coming from someone with extremely sensitive skin. I used to never leave the house without a bra on from feeling self- conscious. Now, I can wear my favorite h Backless tops or semi - supported spaghetti strapped tank tops without feeling exposed! They are reusable and come with multiple pairs of each shape. Great find
customer_reviews.author: MomMaNeedsEZ

customer_reviews.title: Magic!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to wear under a lace dress, where a bra wasn't really necessary. The box says not to wear for more than 6 hours, but this was for a wedding and I probably wore them for about 9 hours. At the end I had to peel them off, they were still so sticky. I washed them per instructions and presto, their tackiness was back and they're all set to wear again. I wouldn't hesitate to purchase these again, though with so many pairs provided, I don't know that I'll have to!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK for occassions but not a good everyday solution
customer_reviews.text: Got to change my review from when I just had them. So these worked great for 4 times (indoor, less than 4 hours each time) before the glue started to peel off from the edge. They were great when they worked, comfy, secure, but they gave out way earlier than promised. Anyway, if you want something for special occasions these are still worth buying, but at least for what I got, this won't be a practical solution for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Question
customer_reviews.text: I have only used one set 3 days so I’m not ready to give a number to the product. I can’t wear bras in the heat so I wanted to keep my nipples from showing. I bought this product because it seemed the best price. I thought I followed instructions for care for these, but one has fallen off 2 of the 3 days I’ve worn them. I rinse them gently at the end on the day. I’ll keep trying, but it could prove embarrassing
customer_reviews.author: RuthEE

customer_reviews.title: covers but outline shows
customer_reviews.text: Open the package everything was very sticky, as in not just the back of the covers. So that was a mess. It covered everything up, but I wear these with tight shirts and the outline showed. I ended up not being able to use them. Looked like i had a mini boob on top of my boob.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect when the 15-yo doesn't want to wear a bra
customer_reviews.text: What else can I say? She's always wearing the cute little strapless or spaghetti strap summer tops; she's got enough going on that she can't go braless, but she hates when the bra straps show. So what the heck, I thought, we'll try these. Home run! They are reusable, she says they fit and stick as advertised, and they don't show under the tops. Exactly what we needed, all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: J. K. Boone

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These nipple covers don't really need another review, but I just wanted to put it out there that this is still a quality product. I wear a size 34D bra and these did not change the shape of my breast at all and were completely invisible under all the dresses I purchased them for. They are comfortable and you will forget you have them on. They stick very well, do not hurt to peel off, and are very close to the color of my skin. I included a photo holding one against my abdomen for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Lavender Waves

customer_reviews.title: Don't stick very well.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth your money. Lucky to get one full use before they start peeling on the edges.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Brown

customer_reviews.title: These are fairly useful. Best worn under thicker tops as they do ...
customer_reviews.text: These are fairly useful. Best worn under thicker tops as they do show through thinner material. I thought I would like the Petal shape better, but the edges do come up a bit and show more. Stick all day, even in warm weather!
customer_reviews.author: Her

customer_reviews.title: Cute nipple covers
customer_reviews.text: Let’s talk about the nips. Granted I Live in Arizona but there’s still a chill factor if you get my drift;-) Now I will spare you my personal anatomy details. Suffice it to say it’s nice to have that kind of protection. I only wish I was a lot smaller to run around with these only (no bra). Obviously that has nothing to do with their product. Anyways, I like the cute flower nipple covers best! They’re soft and reusable 🌺
customer_reviews.author: Griselle

customer_reviews.title: Shows through clothes
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable and they stay on great. My only issue is that you can see the outline of them through clothes, which pretty much defeats the purpose that I bought them for. I wanted something I could wear instead of a strapless bra, but the outline is so distracting they just don’t work, even in blousy shirts. Guess I’ll have to try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: I was not happy with these after opening the package and examining them
customer_reviews.text: I was not happy with these after opening the package and examining them. There was a thin film around the perimeter that would turn up or under and didn't smooth out against the skin well. I initially thought that it was a film that would come off the product but that was not the case. They were also smaller than some that I had used previously. Sending these back....which I hate to do but..... They might work for some but I'm not that person.
customer_reviews.author: S. Barr

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: These worked great! I even wore them in a warmer climate. They stayed on even though I was sweating a bit. They were invisible under my clothing however if you were wearing something a little more sheer or a light fabric that shows every little detail you might be able to see the outline of the cover. For the value tho they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Sammi M.

customer_reviews.title: Wierd LIttle Pasties With No Support
customer_reviews.text: They are tan with a beige spot in the center that makes it look like you are still barebreasted depending on what you are wearing. They definitely do not support the breasts but are designed to conceal you underneath a cotton sports bra, or camisole with built in bra shelf. Would not buy again uless it were for a tween who needed concealment.
customer_reviews.author: S.S.

customer_reviews.title: Outline of covers still show through shirt
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for a tight crop top I have that all my bras look ugly under because of the cut. Unfortunately, the circle outline of the silicone covers show up so it looks even weirder than if I wasn't wearing the covers. I think it's because they are so thick, they don't contour to small breasts well. I thought I could get over it but it really bothered me. Then the return window passed. Maybe these would be better with more loose-fitting clothing. They did stick on pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Ye-Qing Liu

customer_reviews.title: VERY VERY SMALL
customer_reviews.text: This product has a spot about the size of dime to cover the nipple. Maybe that would work for some women but a larger non sticky center would have gotten 5 stars from me. They do stick well, and you forget you are wearing them, but removing them can be a bit painful. If sticky portion were father away from the nipple itself they would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: very much worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Since I bought them couple weeks ago I used them at least every other day. I was very surprised how well they are sticking and how comfortable they are. Sometimes it's really easy to forget you have them on at all. Not sure how long they going to last but so far I am super impressed. Also all this time I just used the same one pair so far.
customer_reviews.author: Maryna M

customer_reviews.title: They are ok.
customer_reviews.text: They work. But... after wearing for about half a day my nipples got a little itchy and when I took them off I had a little red rash/irritation from them. Didn’t last long so it was bearable. And I don’t need to wear them that often so whatever. Also I really wish they made a color selection. When you have a tan complexion these really stick out under your shirt lol
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: These may cause allergic reaction.
customer_reviews.text: I am here to tell you that i have been suffering from an painful rash. My skin looks as if it was burned where the nipple cover was. I missed time from work for days cause I could not wear a bra. I sought medical advice from my family physician and she confirmed it was an allergic reaction and prescribed a cream which help a little. I've heard about the problem with these nipple covers maybe having toxic substance in them. This really makes me sad. I've thrown them away to the trash. Would HIGHLY NOT recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Frossard Fabienne

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable, used multiple times, and stayed on all day!
customer_reviews.text: I've used one pair of these a 2-3 times now already, both all day during the summer while sweaty/at a wedding with dancing! They stayed on great and stayed sticky even after I washed them with soap and water. They were so much more comfortable than a strapless bra! I probably wouldn't wear them with something super tight or thin material, but they worked well with my dresses which were fitted and didn't show. I think 4 pairs will last me a long time!
customer_reviews.author: alpineflower

customer_reviews.title: Buy them, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. I wore them for 8 hours in the humidity and held up through the sweating. Very comfortable and forgot that I was even wearing them. By the end of the day they were still attached well but yet easy to remove. Rinsed them off and was able to use them again. These are the greatest and you can't even tell you're wearing them..
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: These have a very lifelike skin texture. They arrived in a discreet low profile package. Yes they are wide in size to accommodate a wide variety of of body proportions, but I trimmed mine a bit and now theyre perfect. Great coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Vicktoria

customer_reviews.title: Not invisible under clothing
customer_reviews.text: Only one out of the four pairs were good enough to wear. The others just looked like an outline of a very large aereolas. I’d say there’s a quality control problem with these
customer_reviews.author: We really bought this

customer_reviews.title: Stay on through sweat, comfortable, unnoticeable.
customer_reviews.text: I love these because I'm very small chested and I really don't need a bra for a lot of my summer shirts. So I wear these because I'm not interested in having everyone stare at my nipples through my shirt but I want to be comfortable. These work amazing and even if it's hot and you get sweaty, they stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Dani-L

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 36 C and I HATE wearing a bra in the summertime. Especially when I'm wearing a strappy top. (Hint: if I want a little lift I use a piece of medical tape, place it on the bottom side of breast, pull up gently and tape to chest just a few inches over the nipple cover) These babies stay on great but also come off easily. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Sunflower06

customer_reviews.title: Great even in the summer!
customer_reviews.text: I wear these with strappy dresses or tops so I don’t have to worry about bra straps showing. Absolutely love - I have small breasts and they fit/mold very well so it’s not even noticeable. I’ve worn one pair multiple times and the adhesive stays, even after sweating. I put the little plastic cover peels back on after I use to help them last longer, I think it helps!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Reuseable? Yes. 50 uses? More like 4.
customer_reviews.text: These nipple pasties fit well, do not show under clothing, and easy to take off. However, despite washing them after every use, they started peeling after the second wear. Also, they’ll show through if your shirt is thin. If you’re looking for something to replace wearing a bra (which I was) this isn’t the product for you. But if it’s something you’ll wear once in a while then I guess they’re fine.
customer_reviews.author: Olukorede Ogundele

customer_reviews.title: Reusable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I'd been buying one-time use Petal Tops for years before trying these, and wish I found them sooner. They are definitely reusable and also easy to remove. The petal tops I used before would sometimes adhere too strongly to my skin and have actually caused some skin to tear before while removing. These are amazing. I used the first pair for almost a year, and they only loosened after a ton of uses while I was sweating and jumping up and down at a concert. The value per use is great and I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for backless or low v neck
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using the stick on pasties for quite a while now and start noticing my skin peels a little every time I take them off. My friend recommended these to me and I absolutely love it. I like that they are easy to put and and easy to take off. They don’t pull on the skin. The best part is they are reusable so I don’t need to spend as much money buying the one time use. I’ve worn them about 4 time already and haven’t had any issue yet. They still stick pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: You’ll forget you’re wearing them!
customer_reviews.text: I actually fell asleep wearing these because I forgot I had them on! They stick really well, even in 100°+ weather in AZ. I’ve worn 1 set (comes with 4 sets) over and over for the last 2 weeks and the adhesive still works. It says to rinse after every use but I didn’t think it was necessary every time. They leave a tiny bit of adhesive on your skin when you remove them but it didn’t bother me, it rubs off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Olimpia Campos Garner

customer_reviews.title: Would nit reccomend foe women with large nipes
customer_reviews.text: These stick great however they do not completely eliminate nipping. I tried these and my SO said he could still see my nipples through my shirt. I looked in the mirror and sure enough you could see them. I do have larger nipples so i have always had issues looking like im nipping when im not wearing a bra. This product did make them less pronounced but did not give complete coverage. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Miller

customer_reviews.title: Nipple Cover SO WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy nipple covers from a famous maker at a huge box store. They lasted a month, if I was lucky, and a higher price for one set. I bought these not expecting for greater daily wearing time, quality, quantity, and great price. You can rinse them off with water if they get less sticky. These are so worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Joelene

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I am new to products like this, and I was so surprised to see that they actually do work, to give you a nice smooth modest look when you are wearing thin bras. They are so comfortable, you forget your wearing them, and putting on and removing is a breeze. I will always keep this product in my lingerie drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Mshelton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wearing with a leotard if you don't want a bra to show
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old daughter was in an aerial competition and couldn't wear a bra with her fancy leotard. Going braless completely isn't an option because she's starting to developed a chest. These were perfect for her. She was comfortable, everything looked smooth, and they stayed put until she removed them.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: EASY ON, STAYS PUT, EASY OFF
customer_reviews.text: I was going on a 10-day cruise and planned on wearing Formal Wear every night for dinner. None of my bras were going to look right with my formal attire due to the straps. I elected to go braless and wear these fantastic nipple covers. They were easy to apply, stayed put all evening, and did not hurt to take off. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Keegan

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: These do not last very long. The sticking ability is terrible. Unfortunately I think I ordered the wrong ones this one is definitely a cheaper model
customer_reviews.author: Bella9505

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant when I opened the box and the packages were separately sealed and had a protective sheet on one side. I was nervous to use thinking that this would hurt when I removed. It didn't. the adhesive seems to still be strong. I placed the protective sheet back on to preserve. Says its reusable - time will tell how many times.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Marie

customer_reviews.title: I will definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.text: My first time ever trying the silicone nipple covers. So far I have used one pair 5 times, they are good to go for another wearing. I think the advertisement says up to 10 times . I wear under my bra for extra coverage and it definitely provides what I needed. Yes, I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great but comfy
customer_reviews.text: Meh. These are the first pasties I’ve had, and they might all be like this, but I ordered these mainly for a cosplay with a fitted suit and you can totally see them. There’s no hiding. They’re comfortable to wear, feel natural, and are easy to apply and remove, but they’re DEFINITELY NOT for light colors or medium to thin fabrics, or for skin tight fabrics.
customer_reviews.author: Mollie J.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I hate bras. I LOVE THESE. My sis in law introduced me to these type of cover from walmart. These are an amazing value though cuz you get multiple pairs and you can wear them.over and over I'm on day 4 of the 1st pair. They are SO WORTH IT!!! I hate feeling constricted in a bra I'm an A cup and these work great. Doesn't give me much shape but fine for every day use I highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MegB

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!! Useful and long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic and work exactly as described. They last a long time and stick like new after tons of use! They really opened up my warbrobe choices! This is my second purchase of them since I love them so much. My first purchase lasted a long time and would have lasted much longer had my kids not gotten ahold of them and thought they were hilarious toys toys. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia H.

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: These work well for modesty. I have a big chest, and I'm usually cold, so the nipples are out most of the time. These help to make sure my nipples are not so "out there" when I wear thinner blouses made of polyester or chiffon. Easy to clean. I store it in a little plastic container when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Lauj3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I'm not very well endowed and these fit perfectly. I tried another brand prior to this and they were too large and would get caught on my clothing and seat belt strap would move them. These were perfect for me. They are comfortable, stay on very well. Will continue to buy from this seller. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal S

customer_reviews.title: Show's through clothing
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this product! It is comfortable to wear, but it has a plastic like coating over the front of the product which makes sense so it doesnt stick to your clothing, only your skin. However, it is not flush with the edges so the edges has a little bit of that sticking over them which makes its very noticeable with most shirts. They might work with a sweatshirt or something heavier and loose fitting but even my loose long sleeve tshirts it makes me look like I have wet nipples! It's weird and not discreet.
customer_reviews.author: Julianna

customer_reviews.title: reusable and sticky
customer_reviews.text: These pasties have not failed me yet! I have reused them many times (over 10 times so far) and they are still sticking fairly well. They do tend to lose sticking power on the outer rim of the pasty, but that is fine with me. They are easy to wash and dry as well.
customer_reviews.author: Linh

customer_reviews.title: How have I gone through life without these!?
customer_reviews.text: I have a small A cup size and these are great! I read they might not work for small sizes but they look perfect. I hate wearing bras and have many open back shirts I haven't been able to wear but now it is getting hot out and wanted to find a solution... so I purchased these and am really happy.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: big lumpy nipples? no thanks
customer_reviews.text: I think this product might be designed for a certain type of breasts. Maybe the nipple covers blend in more if you have large boobs? On myself, these just looked obvious and odd. Big lumps under my top. =P No thanks, straight up pasties work better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Preston

customer_reviews.title: See through
customer_reviews.text: These were comfortable and stuck very well. But they were very see through for every shirt that I wanted to wear with it, especially white. They would be fine inside but then once I got in the light, it was worse than if I weren’t wearing the covers. Ended up returning them.
customer_reviews.author: John Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Completely useless
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a good product but NOTICE, if you have big breasts, these things are not for you. Zero support and hardly sticky. And it looks super weird on sides of the breast.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S King

customer_reviews.title: Get the petals, not the round!
customer_reviews.text: The round ones don't stick as well as the petal ones. I wore the round ones to dinner once and I could feel them slipping off while I was just sitting there! I don't have this issue with the petals. I only wear the round ones now with skintight outfits because it helps keep them stuck on there. Also haven't been able to wear them more than once. I feel like they're no longer sticky enough for a second use by the time I take them off. Would recommend the petals to people though.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: These worked great for a flowery backless dress I wore to a ...
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for a flowery backless dress I wore to a wedding. I was a little self-conscious that you could see their shape under certain lighting, but I got over it. They stayed on throughout the sweaty 90 degree outdoor ceremony & through a couple hours at the reception. Once I took them off, they seemed like they would have stayed on for much longer. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but could be better..
customer_reviews.text: Came scratched/torn on non-adhesive side. The 'breath' is off-center, so it requires maneuvering to get it to cover completely. Silicone is SUPER thick, and makes it appear as if you are all puffy under shirts.... However, the adhesive really sticks all day, and it isn't harsh when taking it off. It doesn't irritate my skin either which is great. The covers as a whole are very soft and unnoticeable when wearing them. They work best for T-Shirts and such, but not for blouses or thinner materials. This was my first time buying anything like this, so now I know what I do and don't want in a cover....
customer_reviews.author: ToriTay

customer_reviews.title: They do the job but honestly I think it’s better just to let em show
customer_reviews.text: They do the job but honestly I think it’s better just to let em show, who cares. Plus they’re not the most fun to take off. I recommend standing in the shower and letting hot water run over them so they come off easier.
customer_reviews.author: kdav99

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought them because I had some nice clothes they was bare shoulders or bare back side , and I needed them to prevent accidental exposure , I bought them because I had some nice clothes they was bare shoulders or bare back side .They can also be used when I go swimming too! They were soft, let me felt very good, they stuck very well, and the price of six pieces in a box was reasonable. It was a good purchase experience
customer_reviews.author: Alice Payne

customer_reviews.title: Does EXACTLY what it needs to do
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these for a week now. They stay put - even in these hot and severely humid Michigan summer days. I can wear these under a target white and black striped tank top and cannot see them. If you're wearing a paper-thin, white shirt, trashy fabric - these aren't going to be invisible. Just want to ensure no one has those expectations. I even fell asleep with these on and they stayed put. I'm about them. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey L.

customer_reviews.title: I will never go back to a bra
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I have had a small chest all my life and I saw this on YouTube on Shae Whitney’s channel ( she is fun to watch). They seem small but as soon as you put a shirt on, it looks seamless. No more bra straps showing which is terrific for the summer.
customer_reviews.author: L. Grams

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite. Too thick around the edges, so they show under any tighter shirt/dress. The dress I bought these for was not particularly thin (a good weight cloth, actually) but still showed.
customer_reviews.author: esp

customer_reviews.title: NOT reusable
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT reusable. I wore them once, washed them without mild soap and lukewarm water per the instructions. I tried to use them again a few days after washing and they wouldn’t stick. At least the came with 4 pairs, but do yourself a favor and splurge for Nippies brand. They really are reusable.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Girlfriend loved them.  Thank goodness.
customer_reviews.text: They were obviously for girlfriend as on the weekend she likes to “let loose” and it was very noticeable. I got these for her to try and she loved them. She said she had never thought about using them in the past. She says they stay on just fine and she does not feel them when they are on. They are reusable which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: VicS

feature_bullets: FASHION ADHESIVE NIPPLE COVER: Pasties for Women - The adhesive silicone nipple covers are specially designed to to wear under crop tops, sports bra, t-shirts, backless, strapless and sheer dress, swimwear, and gowns.
MADE FROM: lightweight and handy - designed to be small enough to fit in a handbag, Carry these petals in your purse anytime and anywhere for a quick fashion fix.

COMFORTABLE: After each use, simply hand wash the nipple concealers under warm water with a mild soap and let air dry face down. Once dry, self-adhesive properties are restored and can be reused 25 times or more.
